title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.16 - Term of office
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.16 - Term of office

State Regulations

The term of office for each member of the advisory board
shall be three years and successor members shall be appointed by the
commissioner in accordance with the provisions of sections
40.14
and
40.15
of this Part to coincide with
the three-year term. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
40.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
